Soup.slogan: >%name% cut off part of his hand and made soup of it, %target% took a sip and is now sick

Slap.slogan: %name% slapped %target% in the face, %target% didn't know shrooms could slap that hard

Poison.slogan: %name% poisoned %target%, for the first time in ages %target% felt something once again

Fake friend.slogan: %name% promised %target% to be best friends (%name% didnt't mean it)
